  • Constructor Details

    • GameInstance

      public GameInstance​(String gameID, Location signLocation, int minPlayers, int maxPlayers, int startingTime, int winningScore)
      Handles the game instance object. Game instances are instances of games that can be run or are running.
      Parameters:
      gameID -
      signLocation -
      minPlayers -
      maxPlayers -
      startingTime -
      winningScore -

  • Method Details

    • hookJavaPlugin

      public static final void hookJavaPlugin​(MicroGames plugin)
      Hooks the Main Class to this plugin. Although this is not a great implementation I dont want to dependency inject each time we need to make a game instance object. On top of that the JavaPlugin is singleton so we can do this safely.
      Parameters:
      plugin -

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(GamePlayer gp, boolean signJoin)
      Adds a proper GamePlayer to the player list. Displays to all players who joined and how many more are needed.
      Parameters:
      gp -
      signJoin - (If the player joined through a sign)
      See Also:
      Messages, GamePlayer

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(GamePlayer p)
      Removes a player from a game.
      Parameters:
      p -

    • getByName

      public static GameInstance getByName​(String name)
      Goes through all of the game instances on the server and returns a game instance that has the name specified. If no game instance is found the method returns null.
      Parameters:
      name -
      Returns:

    • getPlayerGame

      public static GameInstance getPlayerGame​(UUID UUID)
      Goes through every game instance on the server and finds the game instance a specific player is in. Returns null if no player is found.
      Parameters:
      UUID -
      Returns:

    • getPlayer

      public static GamePlayer getPlayer​(GameInstance instance, UUID uuid)
      Goes through every game instance on the server and finds the GamePlayer specified. Returns null if no player is found.
      Parameters:
      UUID -
      Returns:
